content.question: The Ardabil Carpet’s rich, decorative patterning reflects the influence of Islam on Persian artistic tradition by

choices.label: excluding figural representations of animals or humans
incorporating calligraphic passages from the Qur’an
dividing motifs evenly into four horizontal design registers
including embroidery that features gold-wrapped threads

content.answer: excluding figural representations of animals or humans
